srcDoc:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <style>
    body {
      margin: 0;
      background: transparent;
      font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    }

    .login-button {
      background: linear-gradient(to right, #0B4F66, #21A9E1);
      color: white;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 9999px;
      padding: 10px 32px;
      font-size: 16px;
      font-weight: 500;
      cursor: pointer;
    }

    .login-button:hover {
      opacity: 0.9;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <button
    class="login-button"
    onclick="window.parent.postMessage({ type: 'LOGIN_CLICKED' }, '*')">
    Login
  </button>
</body>
</html>
